metadata.name: Potential Execution of Sysinternals Tools
metadata.comment: Detects command lines that contain the 'accepteula' flag which could be a sign of execution of one of the Sysinternals tools

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―accepteula'))))

output.summary: Detects command lines that contain the 'accepteula' flag which could be a sign of execution of one of the Sysinternals tools

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Legitimate use of SysInternals tools 2. Programs that use the same command line flag Reference: https://twitter.com/Moti_B/status/1008587936735035392
